title: Needs some help
content:
Hi all,

I will try to be sample (my english is not perfect)

Whit ID (CS1) you can go to windos/workspace and register the way you place all your panels. It creates a icon XML, and after that if you want to go work to a custumer, you took you XML icon and you put it in the library/preference/adobe/workspace and your workspace are going to be like when you work at home.

Now it's possible to do that whit Illustrator, did someone know ?

Thank you  
Marc C
author: Marc C

comments.content:
Yes, it appears to put the workspace preferences in your user library (MacOS that is).

[User]/Library/Preferences/Adobe Illustrator CS3 Settings/

edit: (doh, just noticed you're using CS1 so maybe/maybe not)

Yep I using CS1

You think is not possible ?
